title: AIML - Machine Learning Engineer
summary: Do you to be part of the Siri team that puts large language models into billions of devices? We are an applied ML team of around 30 engineers looking for a ML engineer to help develop the next generation Siri experiences. We work closely with various Apple teams in Cambridge UK and Cupertino CA.
description:
As a member of the team you will be responsible for bringing innovative ideas to the next generations of Siri. Our work involves language modelling, simulation, sequential decision making, evaluation, deployment, and so on, spanning the entire product life cycle from project inception to shipping models on billions of devices. The ideal candidate would have expertise with large language models and agentic reasoning.

preferred_qualifications:
Proven industry experience in building product features based on ML
Industry experience in implementing and training large language models
Experience in reinforcement learning and/or decision making in the context of agentic reasoning
Excellent problem solving, critical thinking, and interpersonal skills
Experience using deep learning toolkits PyTorch or JAX
Detailed knowledge of programming languages Python or Swift
